You need to choose the directory from a special Android dialog to give OxycastTV write rights. In the next dialog, please go to the root of the external SD-card and click on the button at the bottom, \'Select\'!
The external SD card is write protected.

Welcome to the CloudRail File Viewer! This application allows you to interact with all your cloud storage accounts. You can browse through your folders and upload, remove and download files. To get started just select a service within the menu on the lefthand side.
As a developer, CloudRail offers you an abstraction layer for a variety of services which makes integrating those easier than ever before! For further information visit:
Answer: Send us feedback (using contact button of app) before leaving any negative feedback in play store.
Question: Failed to play some local video,what can i do?
Answer: Convert your video in supported format eg.mp4 .mkv
Question: Video failed to play,what can i do?

Answer: Most video website have multiple video sources available. app will find as many videos as possible ,this means some videos in the page might be missed,try different link if available of under "Click Here To Cast". make sure video can be played in the app browser without flash,or try to change user agent.
Question: Unable to connect chromecast what can i do?
Answer: check your wi-fi connection ,your phone and chromecast must be connected on same network.
Answer: Ads are apear on website ,not our and not controlled by us.however you can purchase ads blocker to blocked annoying popup and auto redirection.
Question: Why i am seeing many ads?

Answer: Please wait untill loading finished,if the website contains a media player.start the media and wait some seconds.In case the link is still not detected .open media in full screen mode or Restart App or change user agent.
Question: App not detecting media files?
Answer: Browse any media website using webcast button,play media on phone player,when app detect link simply cast it
Question: How to cast web media(videos)?
